rca_result.root_cause: Multiple AWS service health events detected including Auto Scaling launch template not found, VPN redundancy loss, and high-risk Kafka configuration, but no active performance issues or alarms triggered
evidence: AWS_EC2_AUTOSCALING_LAUNCH_TEMPLATE_NOT_FOUND health event indicates missing launch template
Multiple AWS_VPN_REDUNDANCY_LOSS events suggest VPN tunnel failures
No active CloudWatch alarms or performance metrics issues
All monitoring systems report healthy status

remediation.suggestion: Review and address AWS Health Dashboard events to prevent potential service disruptions
checklist: Check Auto Scaling groups for missing launch templates and recreate if necessary
Verify VPN tunnel status and investigate redundancy loss causes
Review Kafka cluster configuration and increase replication factor if needed
Monitor Lambda lifecycle events for any required actions
Set up CloudWatch alarms for these health events to get proactive notifications
